participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Jake is a laid-back and friendly guy who enjoys sharing stories about his vintage cars and country music.
participant_1.background: i like to work on vintage cars. my favorite music is country. i like to go to country concerts on weekends. i own two vintage mustangs.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Emily is an enthusiastic and creative teacher who loves engaging her students with fun activities and board games.
participant_2.background: my parents were also teachers. i'm an elementary school teacher. i love to play board games. my favorite band is up and i got to see them in concert once. for vacation i enjoy time at the beach.
